name: iryscrush-blockchain
description: Match3 game with Irys blockchain integration

scripts.deploy:full: npm run compile && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:quick: node -e "console.log('ðŸš€ Quick Deploy: Use ./quick-deploy.sh (Linux/Mac) or quick-deploy.bat (Windows)')"
scripts.fix-deps: npm cache clean --force && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.fix-path: npm cache clean --force && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install express@4.19.2 path-to-regexp@6.2.1 --legacy-peer-deps
